abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism for delegating authorization to a piece of software, and conveying that delegation to the software. This delegation can include access to a set of APIs as well as information passed directly to the software. This document has been prepared by the GNAP working group design team of Kathleen Moriarty, Fabien Imbault, Dick Hard, Mike Jones, and Justin Richer. This document is input into the GNAP working group.
